summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 9, 2019, notifying that the New York VCAC squad has converted the Jeffrey Epstein case to a 'crisis case' to aid in information management and established a tipline at the national call center. IA is assisting with establishing roles and workflows in Sentinel.

events.title: Epstein Case Converted to Crisis Case
events.description: The FBI's New York VCAC squad (C-20) converted the Jeffrey Epstein case (31E-NY-3027571) to a crisis case to aid in information management and established a tipline at the national call center.

keyFacts: On July 9, 2019, the FBI's New York VCAC squad converted the Jeffrey Epstein investigation into a 'crisis case' for improved information management.
A national tipline was established at the call center as part of this escalation.
Internal Affairs (IA) was assisting the squad in establishing roles and workflows in Sentinel, the FBI's case management system.
The email indicates a coordinated, escalated response within the FBI to the Epstein case in July 2019.
